company.mission: Delivering unforgettable sound and lighting experiences since 2022, we transform ordinary events into extraordinary memories through professional-grade equipment and exceptional service.
company.vision: To be the premier sounds and lights provider in Cavite and Metro Manila, known for reliability, quality, and innovation.
company.story: Founded in 2022 by a team of audio and lighting enthusiasts, Legato Sounds and Lights began with a simple mission: to provide professional-grade equipment and services that make every event memorable. Starting with just a few pieces of equipment and a passion for perfect sound, we've grown to become one of the most trusted names in event production across Cavite and Metro Manila.

team.name: Philson S. Josol
team.bio: Philson brings over 4 years of experience in live sound engineering and has worked with various artists and corporate clients across several areas in the Philippines.

team.name: Ana Reyes
team.bio: Ana specializes in creating stunning visual experiences through innovative lighting design, with expertise in both traditional and LED lighting systems.

team.name: Jose Garcia
team.bio: Jose ensures all our equipment is in perfect condition and coordinates seamless setup and breakdown for every event.
